tc_intro: Welcome to Jers Web Solutions. By hiring our services, you agree to the following terms:
tc_1_text: Jers Web Solutions commits to design and develop the Landing Page as agreed. Includes hosting and domain setup. Does not include content creation or photography unless quoted separately.
tc_2_text: A 50% advance is required to start. The remaining 50% is paid upon delivery. The advance is non-refundable once work begins.
tc_3_text: Delivery times (usually 5-10 business days) start when the client provides all information. Delays by the client will pause the schedule.
tc_4_text: Up to 2 rounds of revisions are included on the proposed design. Major structural changes after approval may incur extra costs.
tc_5_text: We offer a 30-day technical warranty for code errors. This does not cover third-party damages or client modifications.
tc_6_text: Upon full payment, the client owns the usage rights. Jers Web Solutions reserves the right to display the project in its portfolio.
tc_7_text: Hosting and Domain services are annual. It is the client's responsibility to renew them to avoid service interruption.
pp_intro: At Jers Web Solutions, we respect your privacy and are committed to protecting your personal data.

pp_2_text: Information is used exclusively to: A) Respond to inquiries. B) Provide services. C) Send project updates.
pp_3_text: We implement security measures to protect your info. We do not sell or trade your data.
pp_4_text: You have the right to request the deletion of your data from our contact base at any time.
